title: Kolab Pailin - Novel Updates
genre: Historical   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Aristocracy   Death of Loved Ones   Male Protagonist   Poor Protagonist
author: Nhok Them   ញ៉ុក ថែម
description: It portrays the struggling of the people in Cambodia during France Colony. Moreover, it depicts the kindness of an employer, which is considered to be unrealistic. Although it does not present any national independent concept, it illustrates some ideas of how young Khmer women choose their husband.>
